com.github.moribund.entity

Interface PlayableCharacter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player

    public interface PlayableCharacter
    The PlayableCharacter interface is a template for a character that can be interacted with by keys. All playable characters are assumed as visible and movable.
